name: Dragon's Servant
description:
This is an entry for Godot Wild Jam #54.

In a fantasy world, dragon lore Zenith has been captured and cursed away by human paladins. It is up to you, a kobold servant, to save your master from cursed scrolls that keep him bound to a dungeon!

NOTE: Added a web export to submission after deadline for convenience. However, this really hasn't been tested (especially since I used Godot 4), so for stability try the downloads below.
